prompts: Create a majestic fairy-type Pokemon with sparkling gems and flowing pink hair.
I want a Pokemon that glows with light and has an elegant, regal appearance.
Generate a mythical Pokemon that embodies beauty and grace, set in a lush forest.
Make a Pokemon design featuring pastel colors and a jewel-like crown for a magical effect.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a diamond princess with long flowing ribbons and a dazzling aura.
Design a unique fairy Pokemon with a blend of pink and white, showcasing elegance in every detail.
Show me a Pokemon with a delicate body shape and sparkling features that radiate charm.
